channel.title: Electrotherapy – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: ACTIVA 700
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
13 Face-Skin G-Pulse © – 60 Beauty – 58 Fitness – 53 Sport 21 Special Sports – 12 Tens – 3 Rehabilitation – 3 Incontinence 12 Microcurrents – 36 “3S” Serial Sequential Stimulation
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES IN THE NEW 2013 RANGE Globus presents an innovative technology intended to revolutionize the electrostimulation application in beauty, sport and medical fields: 3S (Serial Sequential Stimulation) technology.
“3S” SERIAL SEQUENTIAL STIMULATION: The sequential contraction of the different muscular groups produces a deep pressure wave in the musculature involved causing the interstitial fluid drainage and enhancing the return of the venous blood to the heart.
FACE-SKIN TREATMENTS: ACTIVA 700 offers the new innovative and regenerative G-PULSE currents, proposed for Aesthetic and Beauty applications and able to regenerate the collagen production in the tissues.
G-TRODE HEAD: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a special head that permits, using the G-PULSE programs, to obtain a more effective skin stimulation.
NEW TRENDY CARRYING CASE: ACTIVA 700 is supplied with a practical modern carrying case in aluminum and eco leather that can be carried in an easy way and that makes you feel always fashionable.
FACE AND BREAST AREA: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a complete set of programs for face and breast toning
SPECIAL SPORTS: a special program list to stimulate in an effective and specific manner the muscular areas used in the more common sport activities.
MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 10 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims.
AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation.
SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button.
RUN TIME FUCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment
PROGRAMMABLE: 10 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 15 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 4 independent CHANNELS
Frequency: 0,3 – 150 Hz
Power: 120 mA per channel
Pulse amplitude: 40 – 450 μs
Wave form: Square, biphasic,
symmetrical, compensated
Power supply: rechargeable battery
Back-lit display
Device in II A class
In compliance with the directive
93/42/CEE-2007/47/CEE

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 ACTIVA 700 electrostimulator
1 G-Trode head
4 electrostimulation cables and 2
microcurrent cables
4 self-adhesive square electrodes and 4
self-adhesive rectangular electrodes
1 Gel bottle
1 Charger
1 Operating manual

amplitude: 40 – 450 μs Waveform: square, twophase,
symmetrical, balanced

directive

4 cables for connecting electrodes

ionophoresis

1 operating manual

item.title: DUO PRO
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: • 35 PROGRAMS FITNESS, HEALTH AND BEAUTY in the palm of your hand • BACKLIT DISPLAY • SOFT TOUCH FINISH: Duo Pro offers a pleasant feeling in your hands. Its coating makes it very soft. • EASY TO USE • ABILITY TO CUSTOMIZE TIME IN EACH PROGRAM • HIGH TECH & DESIGN: Duo Pro is a handheld stimulator with modern and innovative design, compact size, backlit display. • A FULL COMPLEMENT OF THE BEST PROGRAMS: To provide superior performance with ease of use. • SPORTS AND PERFORMANCE: 7 essential programs for training and sports performance. • FITNESS: 20 programs to achieve and maintain a perfect physical shape. The best solution to restore the balance and beauty of your body. • HEALTH AND WELLBEING: 8 specific applications for the treatment of pain, acute and chronic inflammatory disorders in the musculoskeletal system.
item.content:encoded:
SPECIFICATIONS
Channels: 2 independent channels
Frequency: 1 to 120 Hz
Power: 40 mA per channel
Pulse width: 50 to 320 μs
Waveform: square, biphasic, symmetrical
and balanced wave
Power supply: 3 batteries 1,5 V AAA
Device Class II Type BF

EQUIPMENT
1 bag
A stimulator PRO DUO
2 cables for connecting the electrodes
4 Square self-adhesive electrodes
4 Rectangular self-adhesive electrodes
1 Operating Manual
3 AAA Batteries

item.title: DUO TENS
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 4 Fitness, Beauty, Wellness – 16 Pain –Tens Globus presents the new Duo Tens electrostimulator with a completely innovated design and performance. PROGRAMMABLE: Duo Tens has 6 free memories where it is possible to insert the desired parameters and to create your personalized programs. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button. PAIN: It eliminates the pain with the special pulses of the TENS currents that, stimulating your body in a soft way, enables you to recover your health, wellness and a renovated life enjoyment. FITNESS, BEAUTY & WELNESS: body beauty is the expression of a wellness state and a form balance that you have to value and defend from the attacks of time and sedentary life. With Duo Tens you can care for your body, defending its vitality and beauty using the main programs for physical shape.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 2 independent
CHANNELS Frequency: 0 –
150 Hz
Power: 100 mA per channel Pulse
amplitude: 50 – 400 μs
Wave form: Square, biphasic,
symmetrical and compensated wave
Power supply: rechargeable battery
Backlit display
Device in II A class
In compliance with the directive

EQUIPMENT
1 Carrying case
1 GLOBUS Duo Tens Stimulator
2 Cables for electrode connection
4 self-adhesive square electrodes
4 self-adhesive rectangular
electrodes
1 Charger
1 Operating manual

item.title: ELITE SII
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
30 Sport - 44 Fitness, Beauty, Wellness – 16 Pain –Tens 6 Prevention – 3 Rehabilitation - 1 Incontinence Globus presents the new Elite SII electrostimulator with a completely improved design and performance.
PROGRAMMABLE: ELITE SII has 6 free memories where it is possible to insert the desired parameters and to create your personalized programs. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button. PREVENTION: 6 programs to reinforce main articulations and to prevent traumas and injuries. SPORT: EliteSII is programed to selectively stimulate fast and slow fibers in order to train different muscle qualities FITNESS, BEAUTY & WELNESS: Thanks to its compactness, lightness and power supply with rechargeable battery, Elite SII is the ideal tool to make an home exercise program to reach and maintain the physical shape. You can care for your body and defend its vitality and beauty with the electrostimulation beauty treatments. REHABILITATION & PAIN REHABILITATION: Muscle stimulation programs are particularly indicated for functional recovery after surgical articulation interventions and after immobilization time PAIN: It eliminates the pain with the special pulses of the TENS currents that, stimulating your body in a soft way, enables you to recover your health, wellness and a renovated life enjoyment. INCONTINENCE: one specific program to treat at home this common disorder.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 2 independent CHANNELS

and compensated wave

1 Charger

item.title: FIT & BEAUTY
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 13 G-Pulse Face-Skin © - 65 Beauty – 58 Fitness – 22 Sport –12 Tens-Pain – 3 Rehabilitation – 3 Incontinence – 12 Microcurrents – FACE-SKIN TREATMENTS: Fit & Beauty presents the new innovative and regenerative G-PULSE currents, proposed for Aesthetic and Beauty applications and able to regenerate the collagen production in the tissues. G-TRODE HANDPIECE Fit & Beauty is equipped with a special handpiece that permits, using the G-PULSE programs, to obtain a more effective skin stimulation. NEW TRENDY CARRIAGE CASE: Fit & Beauty is supplied with a practical modern carrying case in aluminum and eco leather that can be carried in an easy way and that makes you feel always fashionable. FACE & BREAST AREAS: Fit & Beauty is equipped with a complete set of programs for face and breast toning MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 10 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims. PROGRAMMABLE: 10 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button . RUN TIME FUNCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 15 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK

item.title: GENESY 1200 Pro
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: • MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position images directly on the display. • RUN TIME: it permits to modify the contraction parameters during the stimulation. • FAST MENU: for a more rapid navigation • GRAPHIC LCD DISPLAY • FUNCTIONAL RE-EDUCATION: the programs are designed to carry out a proper rehabilitation of the injured person through specific programs with square wave, denervated and interferential. • MICROCURRENTS (MENS): Genesy 1200 offers the new and innovative "regenerative" and "therapeutic" currents, proposed for Sport, Beauty and, especially, Health treatments. • PROGRAMMABLE: 15 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. • 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. • MULTI-USER: Genesy 1200 permits to share the stimulator among 25 users, keeping the setting and the preferences unchanged. • AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): Genesy 1200 is the only stimulator that permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation. • MEMO MODE: Genesy 1200 permits to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims. • SYNCROSTIM: it is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button . • LAST 10: Genesy 1200 stored the last executed programs. Therefore, they are available for a rapid and easy execution.

item.title: GENESY 3000
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: ”EASY PROGRAM” ELECTROTHERAPY MENU: a section where it is possible to rapidly set a program setting the desired parameters (time, frequency, body area) and to execute specific treatments using EMS and Russian(Kotz) currents. MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 25 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims. AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button . RUN TIME FUNCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment PROGRAMMABLE: 15 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 30 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK

item.title: GENESY 3000 Rehab

MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 25 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims. AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation. SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button . RUN TIME FUNCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment PROGRAMMABLE: 15 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 15 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK
